title: When You're Called to Stay
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Shauna Pilgreen
itunes:summary:
God sends some to other countries to share the gospel, but he calls many to minister in their own backyard. John and Danny offer practical advice to help your family become mission-minded wherever you live.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Shauna Pilgreen's book "Love Where You Live" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-03-16?refcd=1068302

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/when-youre-called-to-stay/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
